name: White Chocolate Strawberry Cake
author: Damen
summary: Cake baking is my specialty and this is one of my favorites. The moist, flavorful strawberry cake and the rich, creamy cream cheese and white chocolate frosting combine to create a decadent dessert.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease two 9-inch round cake pans and line with waxed paper
Mix flour and baking powder in a bowl
Beat white sugar, butter, and gelatin together in a separate bowl until fluffy; add eggs, one at a time, beating well with each addition
Stir alternately flour mixture then milk, into sugar mixture to form a smooth batter
Stir vanilla extract and strawberries into batter until combined
Divide batter between prepared cake pans
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of both cakes comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes; cool completely
Stir cream cheese, white chocolate, and heavy whipping cream in a saucepan over medium heat until combined and white chocolate is melted, about 5 minutes
Stir confectioners' sugar into cream cheese mixture until a smooth frosting forms
Spread a layer of frosting over the top of one cake
Place the second cake on top of frosting layer
Frost the top of second cake and sides of both cakes with remaining frosting
